d98f8a694c7d.title: Thank you Dawn 💖 I actually felt really soothed by taking your advice of treating myself with the…

paragraphs.text: Thank you Dawn 💖 I actually felt really soothed by taking your advice of treating myself with the gentle kindness and love that Gery gave me. I really appreciate your loving words and support!
paragraphs.name: 789b

paragraphs.text: Hugs back at ya Rudi 💖

f567f7fc01c7.title: You are brave and amazing to expose your vulnerability so honestly and with such emotion.

paragraphs.text: You are brave and amazing to expose your vulnerability so honestly and with such emotion. I grieve with you though I didn’t know either you or Gery. Yet, I do know you, fellow human, grief survivor who is still swimming in that sea of tears. Swim for as long as you need too, howl as much as your body insists you do. Please also love yourself as Gery…
paragraphs.name: 06fa

paragraphs.text: Mmmmm 🍕🍕🍕 glad you liked it 💖
paragraphs.name: e800

paragraphs.text: Thank you Marie 💖
paragraphs.name: 486e

9fb68f0f3e58.title: I don’t think any of us truly learn how to cope with grief but it’s always there nonetheless.

paragraphs.text: I don’t think any of us truly learn how to cope with grief but it’s always there nonetheless. Thank you for sharing this beautiful piece. ❤
paragraphs.name: c86e

cd30ffbfc2be.title: Death is so very abstract and difficult to imagine happening to any of us, especially to those we…

paragraphs.text: Death is so very abstract and difficult to imagine happening to any of us, especially to those we hold so close. It’s so simultaneously final, eternal, and jarring. I meant it when I said I’d never thought I’d be writing an article like this. But I did find the insanely difficult writing process to be quite cathartic. Now go and do something fun and amazing with your family! 💖
paragraphs.name: aedd

paragraphs.text: alto
paragraphs.name: f5a8

2a6bad75c18e.title: I share with you, as I do with others who go through a loved one’s death:

paragraphs.text: I share with you, as I do with others who go through a loved one’s death:
paragraphs.name: 057d

paragraphs.text:
Do not stand at my grave and weep
I am not there. I do not sleep.
I am a thousand winds that blow.
I am the diamond glints on snow.
I am the sunlight on ripened grain.
I am the gentle autumn rain.
When you awaken in the morning’s hush
I am the swift…
paragraphs.name: eee4

I am a thousand winds that blow.

I am…

92f92d294fdf.title: Thank you for sharing this beautiful heartbreaking story.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing this beautiful heartbreaking story. I have been in silence after my father passed exactly a year ago, could have not described this grieving process any better. Warm hug
paragraphs.name: a8e5

8ebc2c0cfcda.title: Beautiful, heart-breaking, and insightful. Thank you for sharing it.

paragraphs.text: Beautiful, heart-breaking, and insightful. Thank you for sharing it.
paragraphs.name: f8d0

6ddb17ad3d5a.title: Thank you for sharing the beautiful poem!

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing the beautiful poem! Death really puts the physical and metaphysical into perspective. I’m learning so much in this experience, and I see, hear, and feel Gery’s presence everywhere. 💖 So lovely that you have such a deep connection with your grandmother!
paragraphs.name: aaa7

54f453ca91ee.title: Wow…. Ben everything you talked about is very true…..

paragraphs.text: Wow…. Ben everything you talked about is very true….. many years later…. 7 to be exact, at the strangest moments… waterworks…. Keep up the good fight😘
Grieving Ain’t Easy
I was widowed at 34 years old.
paragraphs.name: 59e8

paragraphs.text: Thank you Megan 💖

b3f09505fcbb.title: Thank you for composing this honest, frank take on grief and healing.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for composing this honest, frank take on grief and healing. I am glad you’ve created and published this. I am sure it will benefit many — myself included.
paragraphs.name: 144e

7e717a77eb53.title: Thank you for the beautiful reminder of vulnerability and emotional honesty.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for the beautiful reminder of vulnerability and emotional honesty. Hearing that you sleep with his shirt every night and talk to him as you walk around the house is the sweetest and most heartwarming/breaking thing. You are amazing and Gary had to have been equally amazing to meet you head on. Pizza on me soon.
paragraphs.name: 90f1

paragraphs.text: Thanks Court 💖
